elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Not all goods purchased can be sold. Write down your answers to the following questions in complete sentences.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Which products/services in your range are not selling so well at the moment?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Where do you see the reasons for the poor sales?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What are you or your training company doing to ensure that the goods can still be sold?

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Not all goods purchased can be sold. Write down your answers to the following questions in complete sentences.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Which products did you recently sit on (were you unable to sell)?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What do you or your training company do with goods that cannot be sold?

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Exchange ideas with a colleague. Make a note of similarities and differences.
